extraAttributes.name: Rbs
extraAttributes.doc: Blockade radii in units of the lattice spacing.

extraAttributes.name: Ls
extraAttributes.doc: Linear system size, for a total number of atoms $N = L^2$.

extraAttributes.name: interaction_graphs
extraAttributes.doc: The interaction graphs for the corresponding parameters.

extraAttributes.name: samples
extraAttributes.doc: The QMC samples as a $N_s × L × L$ binary array, where $N_s$ is the number of uncorrelated samples and is fixed at $N_s = 100000$.

extraAttributes.name: observables
extraAttributes.doc: Observable values of the finite-size system computed from QMC data. The observables include energy, x-magnetization, and staggered magnetization, as well as the associated variances and standard errors.
